posts.post_title: N300 Mayo's - Wanted to Buy of Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike Brailey
If anyone has a spare Mayo Cut Plug or 2 they may be interested in selling or trading please drop me a note at mikebrailey@yahoo.com.  I have a few lower grade Mayo's to trade and a number of other vintage cards including many T200's, 205's, 206's and others.

Thanks,
Mike

posts.post_title: N300 Mayo's - Wanted to Buy of Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: leon
Hi Mike
I have a few on my website you might check out....I will usually negotiate or entertain trade offers....I won't guarantee we will always make a deal but I will always be friendly and prompt (unless I space something [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG])
